name: The Devil's Blood
description: '''The Devil's Blood''' was a Dutch [[occult rock]] band from [[Eindhoven]], formed in 2006. Their style is [[hard rock]] in the vein of [[Black Widow (band)|Black Widow]], [[Coven (band)|Coven]], [[Black Sabbath]], and a variety of 1970s [[underground music|underground]] [[progressive rock|progressive]] and [[psychedelic rock]]. It has been described as "seductive, rather than aggressive", featuring female vocals, classical guitar leads, [[analog recording|analog]] atmospherics, and "vintage [[satanism|satanic]] hooks."
